title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit! This incredible kit is designed to ignite your child's curiosity and passion for science while providing an engaging and educational experience. With 25 guided STEM experiment lessons, your child will embark on a journey of discovery and exploration.

The kit includes a 48-page color student guide, providing step-by-step instructions and explanations for each experiment. It's specifically designed for grades 3-6, making it the perfect educational tool for children aged 8 and above. Plus, it has been recognized for its excellence by winning the Parents' Choice Silver Award.

Featuring an electric motor with transparent plastic, this kit allows your child to witness and understand the inner workings of motors. They can even experiment with battery-powered motor operation and reconfigure it to hand-crank an electric generator. By exploring magnetic fields and electric current, your child will develop a deep understanding of these fundamental concepts.

With dimensions of 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, this kit is compact and portable, allowing for easy storage and transportation. It weighs only 1.3 pounds, ensuring that your child can take it wherever their curiosity leads them.

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is the ultimate play and learn experience. It provides hands-on learning opportunities that foster creativity, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills. As a STEM-focused kit, it aligns with the latest educational standards and prepares your child for future success.

Don't miss out on this award-winning science kit that combines fun and learning in one package. Order the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit today and watch your child's love for science come to life!

Are you ready for an electrifying learning experience? Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit! This amazing kit is designed to make STEM education fun and engaging for young minds. With 25 guided experiments, your child will embark on a thrilling journey of discovery.

The included 48-page color student guide will captivate their attention as they explore the world of motors and generators. Designed for children in grades 3-6 and ages 8 and up, this kit is perfect for curious minds who love to play and learn.

We are proud to announce that the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is a Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner! This prestigious recognition is a testament to the quality and educational value of our product.

Get ready to dive into the world of motors and generators with our transparent plastic electric motor. Your child will be amazed as they witness the power of motion conversion firsthand. But that's not all - this kit is reconfigurable, allowing your child to transform their electric motor into a hand-crank electric generator. It's a hands-on experience that brings science to life!

With this kit, your child will also delve into the fascinating realm of magnetic fields and electric current exploration. They'll learn how magnets work, build simple circuits, and even discover the wonders of gears and drive-trains.

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is a comprehensive learning tool that fosters a deep understanding of STEM concepts. Its dimensions of 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth make it compact and easy to store. And weighing just 1.3 pounds, it's lightweight and portable, perfect for on-the-go learning.

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to ignite your child's passion for science! Order the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit today and watch as they embark on an electrifying educational journey.
